item.title: Causal inference according to Judea Pearl
item.description: Reading plan for the 2020 statistics tea club. Starting from January we will go through The Book of Why by Judea Pearl, a (mostly) non-technical introduction to causal inference with graphical models. Order the book from Bookdepository or Amazon Date Location Topic January 30th 2020 DMI Intro, chapters 1 & 2 February 20th 2020 DMI Chapters 3 & 4 March 26th 2020 DMI Chapters 5 & 6 April 30th 2020 DMI Chapters 7 & 8 May 28th 2020 DMI Chapters 9 & 10 June 25th 2020 DMI TBD September 24th 2020 DMI TBD October 29th 2020 DMI TBD November 26th 2020 DMI TBD
